text: Per Theodor Haugen (8 October 1932 - 14 October 2018) was a Norwegian actor. He started stage acting in 1950. He had a supporting role in the comedy movie Støv på hjernen (1959). He was born in Kongsberg. He was married to actress Sissel Sellæg who died on 5 January 2014 in Oslo. They had a son together, actor Kim Haugen. Haugen died in Oslo on 14 October 2018 at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Norwegian movie actors Category:Norwegian television actors Category:Norwegian stage actors
title: Per Theodor Haugen
